version_description:
• Added search function to Add New Trade tab so finding items is quicker and easier
• Each trade listing can now be selected on the Browse Trades and My Trades tabs, which navigates to a new page with additional information and options
• Able to copy PSN, Xbox, and Steam usernames
• Can now view trades by user
• Minor bug fixes

Be sure to follow @rltradingpost on Twitter for updates and demos of new functionality!

• Each trade listing can now be selected on the Browse Trades and My Trades tabs, which navigates to a new page with additional information and options

Be sure to follow @rltradingpost on Twitter for updates and demos of new functionality!

Incoming!

The first major RL Trading Post update is here! This new "My Garage" update allows you to keep track of your inventory and trade history all within the app!

What's new:
• New "Garage" page on the Profile tab where you can view items in your inventory and create listings to get your trades out there.
• New "Completed" page where you can view trades you submitted as "Complete."
• Improved Quick Search feature so you can find the exact item you're looking for even faster.
• Minor bug fixes

Be sure to follow @RLTradingPost on Twitter to receive more updates about the app!

The second major RL Trading Post update is here! You can now chat with other users in the app!

What's new:
• New "Messages" tab for communicating with other traders. Just click the "Message Trader" button on their listing to start a conversation.
• Push notifications and instant messaging for new chat features.
• New "Report" button so scammers, spammers, and other rule-breaking users can be reported.
• Minor bug fixes

Added some much-needed functionality to the Conversation Info page. Your feedback helped with these updates, so please keep the suggestions coming!

What's new:
• You can now view another trader's open listings while you're chatting with them.
• Garages can be unlocked so others can view what items you have.
• Individual items can be locked so when your garage is visible, certain items you won't trade will be hidden.

• Translated entire app, including all item names, certifications, colors, and categories, into German. Support for additional languages will be included in a future update.

• Other minor bug fixes

Incoming!

The fourth major RL Trading Post version is here! This update includes a new tab with a feature that will make trading on RL Trading Post even easier!

What's new:
• Added tab for displaying all tradable items and direct links to their prices on rl.insider.gg
• View more information about each item, including its rarity and how to obtain it

A lot of changes were made behind the scenes to increase RL Trading Post's speed and stability.

Here are some notable changes and fixes:

• Fixed stability issue when messaging another user after viewing their trade
• Fixed issue with double-sending messages
• Added "Pin" conversation feature to better sort your messages

Thank you for your patience while this update was developed! Please leave any feedback at rltradingpostapp@gmail.com.

Incoming!

RL Trading Post now as a new tab for a new feature: the daily Item Shop! You can now view what's in the Item Shop right from the app. This feature has been released as a "beta" because there are still a few things to add and improve, but we couldn't wait any longer to share this update with you.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please email rltradingpostapp@gmail.com! :)
